title: BONUS - You Can Persevere in Hard Things with Jill Briscoe
description:
This is a special episode with our dear friend Jill Briscoe. In this wild time, her calm presence and her wisdom for us on how to endure will give you so much hope today. Don’t miss this conversation on perseverance and prayer and suffering.

Find Jill here: https://www.tellingthetruth.org/
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
